items.title: Are the Texas Longhorns afraid to play the Notre Dame Fighting Irish?
items.summary: As we travel deeper and deeper into the college football playoff era in the FBS, programs all over the country are desperately trying to curate schedules that are the most manageable they can be to make the postseason tournament. They’re also making a mockery of what used to be the greatest regular season in all […]

items.title: NFL Draft: Notre Dame news and notes heading toward the combine
items.summary: The football life cycle now has everyone fixated on the NFL Draft, and with that comes the rite of passage known as the NFL Combine. While Notre Dame is sending its fair share of players to the combine, the big question is what these guys will choose to do once they get to Indianapolis. There […]

items.title: The Joe Moore Award and its Notre Dame roots
items.summary: In short time, the Joe Moore Award for the nation’s best offensive line unit has become synonymous with college football excellence. Joe Moore’s name, obviously, gives the award all the gravitas that it needs, and his time at Notre Dame was legendary. There are, however, several other things that set this award apart from all […]
